bug.author: anirudhacharya
bug.description:
The UpSampling operator documentation is incomplete - <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/api/python/ndarray/ndarray.html?highlight=upsam#mxnet.ndarray.UpSampling>https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/api/python/ndarray/ndarray.html?highlight=upsam#mxnet.ndarray.UpSampling</denchmark-link>
It does not show as a parameter - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/src/operator/nn/upsampling-inl.h#L50>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/src/operator/nn/upsampling-inl.h#L50</denchmark-link> . And in bilinear mode the operator expects <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/src/operator/nn/upsampling-inl.h#L79>two inputs</denchmark-link> - data and weight. Even that is not specified in the documentation. This can cause confusion like in here - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/discussions/13073>#13073</denchmark-link>
